Class DNA

  • java.lang.Object
    • Genome<Codon>
      • DNA

  • public class DNA
extends Genome<Codon>
    A list of a number of Codons. An instance of DNA will code for a sequence of amino acids, representing a biological gene. DNA instances can be crossed over, where segments of the strand are switched with another DNA instance, during reproduction. Individual codons within the DNA can be mutated. DNA will be scored based on how close it is to the goal protein in the genetic algorithm.
